# ServiceDefinitionUtility.TryGetAttribute method

Returns the attribute with the specified name.

```csharp
public static ServiceAttributeInfo TryGetAttribute(this IServiceElementInfo element, string name)
```

## Remarks

Throws a ServiceDefinitionException if the attribute is duplicated.
